SELECT payment.PaymentSeq , user.id , UseTicketManage.exchangeName , UseTicketManage.useTicketName , UseTicketManage.useTicketPrice , UseTicketManage.useTicketEvent , Event_Info.EventName , Event_Info.DiscountRate FROM payment, UseTicketManage, user, Event_Info WHERE 1=1 AND payment.userid = user.mem_seq AND payment.uticketname = UseTicketManage.useTicketSeq AND Event_Info.EventSeq != 0 AND UseTicketManage.useTicketEvent = Event_Info.EventSeq ORDER BY UseTicketManage.applicationPeriod DESC, UseTicketManage.exchangeName
LIMIT ${scopeRow}, ${rowCount}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM payment WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY PaymentSeq DESC
SELECT useTicketSeq, useTicketName FROM UseTicketManage WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY useTicketSeq DESC, useTicketName DESC
